remarks: Restatement of ~ gencbvex with weaker hypotheses.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 6-Dec-2006.)
statement:
gencbvex2.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
gencbvex2.2 $e |- ( A = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
gencbvex2.3 $e |- ( A = y -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
gencbvex2.4 $e |- ( th -> E. x ( ch /\ A = y ) ) $.
gencbvex2 $p |- ( E. x ( ch /\ ph ) <-> E. y ( th /\ ps ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d ch y $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
$d th x $.
